name: Twin Edge
description:
_/ TWO CIRCLES \_
_/ ALWAYS ROTATING \_
_/ DOUBLE THE CHALLENGE \_



Twin Edge is a very simple but certainly tricky to master rhythm game based on dividing attention.

Your goal is to click on the beat when the circle cursor touches a note.

Features:
  • Challenging rhythm-based gameplay
  • 20+ official levels
  • Beautiful, minimalistic visuals
  • Global and local leaderboards
  • Progression system with unlockable customization options
  • Mutators that let you customize your game experience
  • Original soundtracks and known music artists
  • Custom level editor
